observation: Home  Welcome to the Katzbach Insurance Agency, we're here to help you HOME ABOUT US OUR TEAM OUR PARTNERS PRODUCTS CONTACT US GET A QUOTE CLAIMS BLOG GALLERY Mon-Fri 8:30am-5:00pm Sat-Sun Closed 902 Westpoint Pkwy Suite 300 Westlake OH 44145 (440) 835-1770 john@katzbachinsurance.com          Review us on G o Auto Insurance Homeowners Insurance Condo Insurance Dwelling Fire Insurance Motorcycle Insurance RV / Travel Trailer Insurance Boat Insurance Umbrella Insurance Flood Insurance Life Insurance Contractor Insurance Business Insurance   Katzbach Insurance We are a family-owned and operated agency, established in 1983 by John Katzbach, Jr.   Katzbach Insurance Agency serves the insurance needs of many individuals, families and business concerns in Cuyahoga County and adjacent areas. As an independent agency representing a carefully selected group of financially sound and reputable insurance companies, we place your policy with the company offering the best coverage at a competitive price. Our Products What People Say   Great service!!!! Jennifer F. Client Great service!! Would totally recommend them to everyone!! Very helpful and informative! Bernadette F. Very friendly and timely service, and Nancy is the best! Eddy P. Excellent insurance agent. Best prices for insurance! Richard P. Jennifer was great! Very detailed and patient in explaining everything! Thank you Katzbach Insurance and Jennifer for your help! Bridget S. I have been with Katzbach my whole life. They are a great company.  Jen is always so helpful, friendly, and very quick to get back to me.  I will never go anywhere else!!!! David S. If you have time please leave us a review on Google. Our Partners An Ohio Licensed Independent Agency. ©2019 Katzbach Insurance. All rights Reserved. Website created by John Katzbach III “All your insurance needs under one roof.” Whether it’s escaping on your motorcycle, cruising in your boat or trekking cross-country in your RV, we can help protect whatever moves you. We can help you plan for  wherever life takes you, and make sure your insurance needs are met with outstanding coverage, service and value.  Contact Info 902 Westpoint Pkwy Suite 300  (440)-835-2003  (Fax) Additional Links Our Team Claims Contact Us All your insurance needs under one roof! Welcome to the Katzbach Insurance Agency, we're here to help you Top

thought: The certificate information shows that the website is secured with a certificate from Let's Encrypt and is current, not expired. The presence of a valid SSL/TLS certificate is a good sign, although it is not conclusive evidence of legitimacy. Scam sites can also use free certificates to appear secure. I should proceed with further verification by checking for any user complaints or reports related to the website.

There are no Reddit posts related to the website being a scam, which is a positive indication. However, the absence of such posts does not definitively rule out the possibility of the website being a scam. It could also be that users have not reported it on Reddit or that it has not been discussed there. I should check for any mentions on Twitter to see if there are any reports or complaints there.

There are no relevant results on Twitter related to the website being a scam. This, combined with the absence of reports on Reddit, suggests that there might not be widespread complaints or issues. However, to be thorough, I will perform a general search to see if there is any discussion or mention of the website that could provide further context.

thought: The search results show listings of the website itself, its team members, and other sites that list reviews and information about the agency. The presence of reviews and a profile on TrustedChoice.com, which is an independent insurance agency directory, along with customer reviews on Birdeye, are positive indicators that the website is a legitimate business. It seems that the website does not match the characteristics of a scam website based on the information gathered. The domain has a long history, there are no complaints found on Reddit or Twitter, the website has a valid SSL certificate, and there are positive reviews available online. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.katzbachinsurance.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has a legitimate domain registration history a valid SSL certificate absence of scam reports on social media and Reddit and positive online reviews which do not align with the characteristics of scam websites.
